mapper.insert: insert into article(article_title, article_summary, article_content, article_view_count, article_like_count, article_comment_count, created_time, update_time, is_deleted, article_category_id, article_category_name, article_user_id) values (#{articleTitle}, #{articleSummary}, #{articleContent}, #{articleViewCount}, #{articleLikeCount}, #{articleCommentCount}, #{createdTime}, #{updateTime}, #{isDeleted}, #{articleCategoryId}, #{articleCategoryName}, #{articleUserId})
mapper.select: select article_id, article_title, article_summary, article_content, article_view_count, article_like_count, article_comment_count, created_time, update_time, is_deleted, article_category_id, article_category_name, article_user_id from article where article_id = #{articleId} and is_deleted = 0

select article_id, article_title, article_summary, article_content, article_view_count, article_like_count, article_comment_count, created_time, update_time, is_deleted, article_category_id, article_category_name, article_user_id from article where article_category_id = #{categoryId} and is_deleted = 0 order by update_time

select article_id, article_title, article_summary, article_content, article_view_count, article_like_count, article_comment_count, created_time, update_time, is_deleted, article_category_id, article_category_name, article_user_id from article where is_deleted = 0 order by article_like_count, update_time

select article_id, article_title, article_summary, article_content, article_view_count, article_like_count, article_comment_count, created_time, update_time, is_deleted, article_category_id, article_category_name, article_user_id from article where is_deleted = 0 order by article_like_count, update_time

select article.*, user.nickname, user.avatar from article inner join user where article.article_user_id = user.user_id and article.is_deleted = 0 order by article.article_view_count desc, article.update_time desc limit 0, 10

select article.*, user.nickname, user.avatar, user.school from article inner join user where article.article_user_id = user.user_id and user.school = #{schoolName} and article.article_category_id = #{categoryId} and article.is_deleted = 0 order by article.update_time

select article_title, article_summary, article_content, article_view_count, article_comment_count, created_time, update_time, is_deleted, article_category_id, article_category_name, article_user_id from article where article_title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or article_content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') and is_deleted = 0
select article.*, user.* from article inner join user where article_user_id = user_id and is_deleted = 0
select article.*, user.* from article inner join user where article_user_id = user_id and article_category_id = #{categoryId} and article.is_deleted = 0

select article_title, article_summary, article_content, article_view_count, article_comment_count, created_time, update_time, is_deleted, article_category_id, article_category_name, article_user_id, user.* from article inner join user where article_user_id = user_id and article_id = #{articleId} and article.is_deleted = 0

select article_title, article_summary, article_content, article_view_count, article_comment_count, created_time, update_time, is_deleted, article_category_id, article_category_name, article_user_id, user.nickname, user.avatar from article inner join user where article_user_id = user.user_id and is_deleted = 0 and article_category_id = #{categoryId} order by created_time desc

select article_title, article_summary, article_content, article_view_count, article_comment_count, created_time, update_time, is_deleted, article_category_id, article_category_name, article_user_id, user.nickname, user.avatar from article join user where article_user_id = user_id and is_deleted = 0 order by created_time desc

select article_title, article_summary, article_content, article_view_count, article_comment_count, created_time, update_time, is_deleted, article_category_id, article_category_name, article_user_id from article where is_deleted = 0 and article_user_id = #{userId} order by created_time desc
